unnormalised: Choosing a payment gateway is tougher than deciding what to eat at a Delhi wedding buffet! So many options!
normalised: Choosing a payment gateway is tougher than deciding what to eat at a Delhi wedding buffet! So many options!

unnormalised: It's like trying to find the perfect biryani – everyone swears theirs is the best.
normalised: It is like trying to find the perfect biryani – everyone swears theirs is the best.

unnormalised: My chacha, Rajeev, lost a whole day figuring it out.
normalised: My chacha, Rajeev, lost a whole day figuring it out.

unnormalised: Read reviews, understand the fees (Rs. 50, Rs. 100 different is huge!).
normalised: Read reviews, understand the fees (rupee fifty, rupee one hundred different is huge!).

unnormalised: Your customers will thank you (and buy more sarees!).
normalised: Your customers will thank you (and buy more sarees!).

unnormalised: Otherwise, you'll be saying "Hai Rama!" a lot.
normalised: Otherwise, you will be saying "Hai Rama!" a lot.
